name: Kintsugi (SilverWater)
description:
Kintsugi is a 3D puzzle game where your goal is to build again some beautiful potteries that have been broken in pieces. Take the piece, look closely, and put it back in place! Enjoy a calm and relaxing moment :) 

Left click is used to take and place pieces, and left drag is to look around and rotate pieces. Right click is used to put a piece back on the table.

This is a pretty unpolished experience made by 6 people in Paris for Global Game Jam 2020.  :)
